meanings.definition: Involve as a necessary or inevitable part or consequence.
meanings.sent1: Taking care of a pet entails feeding and walking it every day.
meanings.sent2: Completing the project entails working together as a team.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your umbrella entails getting wet in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Winning the championship entails hours of practice and dedication.
meanings.sent5: Traveling to a new country entails experiencing different cultures and cuisines.

meanings.definition: Restrict the inheritance of (property) to a specified line of heirs.
meanings.sent1: The will entails that the house can only be passed down to the eldest son.
meanings.sent2: The trust fund entails that the money can only be used for education purposes.
meanings.sent3: Inheriting the antique clock entails following a strict set of rules for its care.
meanings.sent4: The family heirloom entails a long history of being passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The legal document entails that the land can only be inherited by blood relatives.
